overview: A high-school girl recalls the events of the last summer of her life. Mainly, her relationship with an autistic fellow class member. A parody of the major tropes usually found in high-school level student films; including the cinematography and editing style, plot structure and production value.

production_companies.name: תיכון עירוני ע״ש רבין למדעים ולאמנויות ולמדעים

tagline: מה זה, אין דלתות בבית הזה?
title: The Closed Notebook
